attributes.action: develop a written constitution and undertake the fundamental remaking of the Executive, Legislature and Judiciary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our unwritten constitution, the very bedrock of our society, the rule of law and governance is irreparably damaged – to even try to tinker with this is to build on the shakiest of foundations. A written constitution would mean the setting down of a new bill of rights that establishes our freedoms as individuals and a would be a means to bind our politicians absolutely to maintaining democratic principles. Added to this is a requirement to remake our institutions of government to make them fully accountable to, and under the control of, the people to  ensure we are secure from civil rights abuses by any government or government authority.
